entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Enhance LoggerMessage attribute to support logging complex object and redaction #81730
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: System.Data.IAsyncDbConnection #81723
  • Default constructor trimmed for generic argument #81720
  • FileSystemWatcher Changed event fires only after right click on file. #81717
  • Test timing out `System.IO.Tests.File_ReadWriteAllBytes.ReadAllBytes_NonSeekableFileStream_InUnix` on coreclr/osx #81714
  • DOTNET_Thread_UseAllCpuGroups does not have a runtimeconfig equivalent property #81713
  • Trying to verify continuation task web response result #81708
  • HttpStress fails to build msquic #81706
    8.0.0
  • Provide custom marshaller for `USER_INFO_1` #81705
    8.0.0
  • ConstructorContainsNullParameterNames despite custom JsonSerializerContext in Blazor WASM #81709
  • Regex generator with LangVersion < 11 results in many errors #81704
    8.0.0
  • JsonConverterAttribute not working with source-gen when converter is internal type #81703
    8.0.0
  • BinaryData + JSON source gen produces compile errors #81702
    8.0.0
  • [Docker] No frameworks were found. #81701
  • Pax Headers incorrectly treated is invalid if value contains an '=' sign #81699
  • Mono HelloWorld is broken for AOT #81696
  • [JSImport] and Exceptions #81710
  • `codepages.nlp` binary in `System.Text.Encoding.CodePages` #81693
    Future
  • `.upsmap` binaries in `System.Speech` #81692
  • `do-jit-call.wasm` binary in `wasm/runtime` #81691
  • SPMI: Warn when comparing throughput of JITs compiled with PGO data #81690
    8.0.0
  • ServiceProvider deadlock when recursive resolving scoped services from another thread #81689
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'tree->gtVNPair.BothDefined() || tree->OperIs(GT_PHI_ARG)' during 'Do value numbering' #81688
    8.0.0
  • Support WindowStyle without UseShellExecute in ProcessStartInfo and Process implementation on Windows #81681
  • Fail to run Q# program because an dotnet runtime error #81679
  • TestCallingConventions failing #81677
    8.0.0
  • Selecting Network Interface for Socket Connections #81698
    8.0.0
  • DisabledRuntimeMarshalling failing #81676
    8.0.0
  • [Fuzzlyn] Jump into the middle of handler region #81675
  • PInvoke/Array/MarshalArrayAsParam/AsLPArray/AsLPArrayTest failing #81674
    8.0.0
  • interop\LayoutClass\LayoutClassTest failing #81673
    8.0.0
  • TimeZoneInfo bug changes offset twice within 1 hour #81672
  • Test failure System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Tests.ReferenceHandlerTests_Default_String.ArrayPreserveDuplicateObjects #81670
    8.0.0
  • Test failure Loader\\classloader\\regressions\\dev10_403582\\dev10_403582\\dev10_403582.cmd #81669

Closed

  • ConfigurationSection not loading under latest assembly package #81488
    8.0.0
  • [wasi] Enabling icu in wasi.proj breaks tests #81560
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] [debugger] Compilation error in debugger on `Debugger.evaluateOnCallFrame` command contains `stacktrace` in format that is not compatible with CDP #81333
    8.0.0
  • Assertion in failure in System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Roslyn4.4.Test #81671
  • Unable to sign StandardOptimizationData.mibc #81601
  • [Mono] Enable Mono AOT compiler to print out the list of compiled methods #79551
    8.0.0
  • dotnet 7 on win7 x86 Could not load file or assembly, A dynamic link library (DLL) initialization routine failed. (0x8007045A) #79616
  • JIT: More cases for last-use copy elision #80494
    8.0.0
  • Creating tar file from a directory owned by an unknown group throws an exception on Linux #81658
  • Consider settings startup environment variables in runtimeConfig.json #65457
    Future
  • Test failure: baseservices\callconvs\TestCallingConventions #81365
    8.0.0
  • [System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow] Data loss during parallelization of BufferBlock. #31513
    8.0.0
  • The configuration values are inconsistent #81680
  • Extra ILC warnings when PublishAOT=true on property with UnconditionalSuppressMessage #81129
    8.0.0
  • Optimize Vector.Create("utf8-literal"u8) #81643
    8.0.0
  • RyuJIT does not optimize multiple integer equality comparisons #81668
  • Convert.ToDateTime reports that the error was not handled by the user when using the handler #81622

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] Migrate jiterpreter hit counting to C #81729
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add Host.CreateEmptyApplicationBuilder #81728
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Fix contract violations. #81727
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Avoid using `file` in generated regexes pre-C# 11 #81726
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix a bug around Vector4.Distance and Sse41.Insert lowering #81725
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • EnableAotAnalyzer for System.Diagnostics.EventLog #81724
    area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog
  • Default media type used when 'null' is passed to StringContent #81506 #81722
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [JIT] X64 - Peephole optimization to skip emitting `movsxd` #81721
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-preview1] Split Mono manifest creation into a separate subset #81719
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.4
  • SPMI: Warn when comparing throughput of JITs compiled with native PGO #81716
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Skip generated wrappers when trying to step into/out with JustMyCode enabled #81715
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [release/7.0] Update arm queues #81712
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • WIP: Enable AppleAppBuilder to bundle iOS applications built for NativeAOT runtime #81711
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2106078 #81700
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono] RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan<T> is now intrinsic. #81695
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Serialize primitive types in ReflectionXmlSerializationWriter using char[]. #81687
    area-Serialization, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Baseline most of the Pri0 test suite #81685
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Fix handling of the generic byreflike constraint #81684
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Delete leftover reflection eventsource handling #81686
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Adjust workaround for event source resource stripping #81528
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Run nativeaot tests in helix #81439
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix order of parameters in exception message formatter. #81718
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Wrap exceptions in reflection virtual method resolution #81682
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update icu version and uncomment wasi icu libc #81694
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [wasm][debugger]Adding stack info to the exception details when evaluating expressions #81440
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Simplify language version check in Regex generator #81678
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • [wasm] jiterpreter cleanup and performance improvements #81707
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Split Mono manifest creation into a separate subset #81598
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • EnableAotAnalyzer by default for src libraries #81608
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • prevent use of null when processing alpn list #81629
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 8.0.0
  • LSG: removing unnecessary null forgiven operators and refactor other minor nullability issues #81662
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Enable AOT to print out the list of compiled methods #81567
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • SPMI: Display TP diffs as a range in the header #81661
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use initialCapacity in ASN.1 templates for some primitives #81626
    area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • [wasi] Support builds with no relinking #81648
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, wasi
  • Fix handling of postponed messages in TargetCore #81011
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2105677 #81359
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][interp] Align simd types to 16 bytes by default #81219
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • NativeAOT Fully implements warning suppressions logic #81266
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Optimize IND<SIMD>(RVA) #81651
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] correctly initalize CONTEXT before failing fast #81010
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Adjust impNormStructVal to not wrap in GT_OBJ #81636
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: fix issue with partial comp pred list maintenance #81605
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix spmi jit flag dumper for new flag #81667
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] CI: add wasi jobs to runtime-wasm #81647
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, wasi
  • Set UseLLVMLinker=true when targeting FreeBSD by default #81642
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • [mono] Implement synch block fast paths in managed #81380
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Initial work to port EventPipe library to NativeAOT #80382
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][debug] Avoid pausing on breakpoint while invoking methods. #81162
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Improve performance of ConfigurationBinder (#81183) #81660
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Allow source-build to set UsingToolMicrosoftNetCompilers property #81180
  • Try to minimally light up Vector2, Vector3, Quaternion, and Plane for Mono SIMD #81541
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #81281
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-System.Resources, 6.0.15
  • [Jiterpreter] Add support for TryGetHashCode intrinsic #81644
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, community-contribution
  • [EXPERIMENTAL] insertion of enabled MSBuild Server by default #81617
  • Clean up hex formatting, vectorize Guid.TryFormat for UTF8 #81666
    area-System.Runtime
  • Enable AVX512 Additional 16 SIMD Registers #79544
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512, 8.0.0
  • add RIDs for Wolfi #81589
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove duplicated code #81611
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Make `WasmMainJSPath` optional #81484
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix ds-ipc-pal-socket.c Windows build. #77840
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Reduce allocations in `BinaryReader`. #80331
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Enable SIMD #80797
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement XML log fixer for Helix #80751
  • Unify type instantiations in reflection emit #81518
    area-System.Reflection
  • Fix JSON required read-only properties used as parametrized ctor #78152
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Update heap hard limit for large pages #81292
    Servicing-consider, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Decommit memory before returning to the region_allocator #81295
    Servicing-consider, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • WIP: Implement native container types used by shared EventPipe code. #78852
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Improve CI path-changes-based-triggers to work better #79127
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] [Mono] Fix function pointer check #80927
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • [JIT] LclMorph `GT_IND(GT_LCL_VAR_ADDR)` => `GT_CAST(GT_LCL_VAR)` for small types #81454
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create AND chains in bool optimizer pass #79283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support use of fast-path serialization in combined JsonSerializerContexts. #80741
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Disable outerloop tests on mono/mobile and fix timeout in sendtohelixhelp.proj #79885
  • JIT: Expand runtime lookups in a late phase #81635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix max chunk size limiting #81607
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Don't clone a large tree in impRuntimeLookupToTree #81472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make DotNetBuildFromSource work in more cases. #81480
    community-contribution
  • [wasm][icu] ICU files sharding + custom icu data loading for WASM #80421
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Fix EncodingExtensions.Convert for sliced single segment ROSequence #81665
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Add basic support for folding SIMD intrinsics #81547
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Relax reg-optionality validity checks #81614
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix for issue #80350 tracking runtime deficiencies in the presence of static virtual method reabstraction #80987
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • don't send server_name when literal IP #81631
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • Vectorize ProbabilisticMap.IndexOfAny #80963
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Enforce HttpClient limits on GetFromJsonAsync #80553
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Enforce HttpClient limits on GetFromJsonAsync #80552
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Allow retaining the original casing for known header values #80754
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • Fix HTTP3 header decoder buffer allocation #78862
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [QUIC] Added tests to check IsSupported. #81481
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Quic
  • [mono] Handle Assert failure when GetDelegateForFunctionPointer is invoked with VoidDelegate type #79530
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • [EXPERIMENTAL] Optimized conversions between `Half` and `Single`. #81632
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix generic parameter data flow validation in NativeAOT #81532
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve XmlSerializationWriter.WriteTypedPrimitive #76436
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0][browser][http] Fix blocking of streaming response and abort #81092
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • Handle crash when [out] parameter of type int is passed to delegate #81276
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable partial compilation of methods #80635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasi] Open PR to run *all* the tests #81649
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, wasi
  • fuse < and > with = when applicable #78786
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
